了解適當的手術管理。選項皆為手術程序。
Knows appropriate surgical management. The response options are all surgical procedures.
以下哪種手術管理方式最恰當？
- Which of the following is the most appropriate surgical management?
熟悉術前/術後或操作管理。
Knows preoperative/postoperative or procedural management.
以下哪種術後管理最合適？
- Which of the following is the most appropriate postoperative management?
以下哪項是最適當的術前準備？
- Which of the following is the most appropriate preoperative preparation?
在執行程序 (或指定程序) 前，首先適當的做法是取得/進行下列哪一項？
- Prior to the procedure (or specify the procedure), it is appropriate to first obtain/do which of the following?
了解住院或轉至其他適當機構的指徵。了解適當的非住院醫療保健機構，例如護理機構、安寧照護或有健康照護人員協助的居家照護。

Knows indications for admission to the hospital or to other appropriate setting. Knows appropriate nonhospital health care settings, such as a nursing care facility, hospice care, or at-home care with assistance of health aide.
根據下列哪項因素，建議放置於 _________ 處？
- Placement in a/an _________  is recommended based on which of the following factors?
將此病患轉移至下列哪個住院機構最合適？
- To which of the following inpatient facilities is it most appropriate to transfer this patient?
熟悉最適合的出院計畫。
Knows most appropriate discharge planning.
在與這位病患討論出院計畫時，下列哪一項建議最合適？
- In discussing discharge plans with this patient, it is most appropriate to advise him/her of which of the following?
在該病患出院前，最合適的是就下列哪一項向其提供諮詢？
- Before this patient is discharged, it is most appropriate to counsel him/her regarding which of the following?
以下哪個是後續跟進最合適的目標？
- Which of the following is the most appropriate goal for follow-up?
了解復健計畫的組成部分，例如假肢、心靈社會因素或運動功能障礙。
Knows components of rehabilitation program, such as prostheses, psychosocial factors, or motor dysfunction.
回覆選項是復健管理步驟。
The response options are rehabilitation management steps.
以下哪一項是其整體照護中最適當的考量？
- Which of the following components of his/her overall care is most appropriate to consider?
了解關於安寧照護的適當使用和程序。
Knows appropriate use and procedures regarding hospice care.
以下哪一個步驟對於這位病人的安寧照護最恰當？
- Which of the following is the most appropriate step regarding hospice care for this patient?
以下哪一個是下一個最恰當的步驟？(安寧療護轉介是正確答案) 向病患或家屬宣導自我照護，例如哺乳、居家血壓測量和血糖監測。 回應選項可以是多種病患行為。

- Which of the following is the most appropriate next step?  (hospice referral is correct answer) Educates patient or family regarding self-care, such as breast-feeding, or at-home blood pressure measurement and glucose monitoring. The response options can be a variety of patient actions.
以下哪一個是最恰當的建議？
- Which of the following is the most appropriate recommendation?
以下哪種做法對這位病患最合適？
- It is most appropriate to advise this patient to do which of the following?
了解相關醫療輔助人員的角色。
Knows relevant roles of allied health personnel.
接下來最合適的步驟是與下列哪一項安排諮詢？
- The most appropriate next step is to arrange consultation with which of the following?
以下哪一個最適合轉介此病人？
- It is most appropriate to refer this patient to which of the following?
